derivation: plural masculine מְסִבִּים; or feminine מְסִבּוֹת; from H5437 (סָבַב);
outline:
1. round thing, surroundings, round about, that which surrounds, that which is round
    1. environs
      1. surrounding places
      2. round about (adv)
    2. round table
kjv_def: that compass about, (place) round about, at table.
strongs_def: a divan (as enclosing the room); abstractly (adverbial) around
